attributes.action: issue a public apology to the ordinary people of Iceland for his recent comments in the media in which he labels the nation as irresponsible and criminal.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Our Prime Minister has insulted the entire nation of Iceland for the irresponsible actions of a handful of it's citizens.  This has caused considerable and avoidable tension between the Icelandic people and the UK and may drive the Icelanders into the arms of the Russians.  The Prime Minister should apologies for his ill thought comments and concentrate on pursuing those Icelandic bankers resident in the UK for their actions.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
